name: Earthquake Mitigation VR
description:
Play through 3 scenarios to learn about earthquake mitigation!

Language: Bahasa Indonesia

*Require Oculus Rift S to play.

Sandal Jepit Team:

- Dicky Chandra Wijaya as UI Designer .

- Gabriabel Yudhistiro as Game Programmer.

- Geraldo Pratama Wahyu Teddy as Game Designer & 3D Artist.

- Yogi Udjaja as Project Supervisor & Advisor.
